archimate:Goal.name: Ensure country-specific education and promotion needs for protective security are taken into account in the Security Awareness project
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Meeting with Mikael Lingskog 9/5: Stressed that country-specific education should only be for National Security Act trainings, no other country specific trainings should exist. Clarified the goal by adding "Protective Security".
Finland Protective Security Training is back in scope as decided by Lingskog in Security Awareness Project Status - 2023-05-17
